metadata.shortInfo: This track shows classical alleles comprised of insertions, deletions, substitutions and complex changes.

style.height: function(feature) {var rflp = feature.get('rflp'); var status = feature.get('status'); if (rflp && status == 'Confirmed') {return 14;} else {return 8;} }
style.color: function(feature) { var method = feature.get('type'); if (method=='deletion') {return 'red';} else if (method=='point_mutation') {return 'yellow';} else if (method=='substitution') {return 'yellow';} else if (method=='complex_substitution') {return 'blue';} else {return 'white';} }
